name: Let's Make a Potion
description:
Welcome Potion Crafter! Lets Make A Potion is a casual puzzle like experience where you have to collect the correct potion ingredients and avoid collecting the wrong ingredients. By completing potions they will become more difficult to complete and you will need to be quicker! How many potions can you create?

Features:
Easy Controls
Increasingly Difficult Speed
Increasingly Difficult Recipes
